opening_theme: #1: "We can!! HUG tto! Precure (We can!! HUGっと！プリキュア)" by Kanako Miyamoto
#2: "HUG tto! YELL FOR YOU (HUGっと！YELL FOR YOU)" by Cure Yell (Rie Hikisaka), Cure Ange (Rina Honnizumi), Cure Étoile (Yui Ogura), Cure Macherie (Nao Tamura), Cure Amour (Yukari Tamura)
ending_theme: #1 "HUG tto! Mirai☆Dreamer (HUGっと！未来☆ドリーマー)" by Cure Yell (Rie Hikisaka), Cure Ange (Rina Honnizumi), Cure Étoile (Yui Ogura) (eps 1-17, 19-21)
#2 "Friends With You (キミとともだち)" by Cure Amour (Nao Tamura), Cure Macherie (Yukari Tamura) (ep 18)
#3 "DANZEN! Futari wa Pretty Cure ~The One and Only Twin Lights~ (DANZEN! ふたりはプリキュア〜唯一無二の光たち〜)" by Mayumi Gojou (eps 22, 36-37)

#4 "HUG tto! YELL FOR YOU (HUGっと!YELL FOR YOU)" by Cure Yell (Rie Hikisaka), Cure Ange (Rina Honnizumi), Cure Étoile (Yui Ogura), Cure Amour (Nao Tamura),Cure Macherie (Yukari Tamura) (eps 23-35, 38-)
